ProductInfo.Features:
View a live camera from anywhere in the world via any browser, remote viewing & control from any smart phone, tablet or computer in the World.
Support P2P ,let  you control from any smart phone, tablet or computer in the World
Multi-platform support ,10-LEDs night vision - In well-lit areas, it provides crisp, full color video during, In darker conditions, the camera automatically enables Night Vision, so you can see in incredibly low lighting levels down to 0.5 lux (almost complete darkness)
Advance video motion detection with sound alerts, instant email with 6-8 snapshots so you know when something is going on
Built-in audio support for two-way communication (Talk through the camera from anywhere in the world.? Just click the 'talk' tab and do it!)
ProductInfo.Name: EZETEK P2P Wireless IP Network camera security system for surveillance , remote controlling and reviewing, 15 meter Night Vision,IR CUT,two-way audio,TF card , email alerts,multi-platform support, Pan/tilt: 355°/120° EZ-IC003
